alert.note: Alert for Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 7:19PM CDT until June 17 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tom Green County in west central Texas... Northeastern Irion County in west central Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 718 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Arden around 730 PM CDT. Tankersley around 740 PM CDT. Twin Buttes Reservoir around 750 PM CDT. San Angelo State Park and Lake Nasworthy around 755 PM CDT. O.c. Fisher Reservoir around 800 PM CDT. San Angelo and Grape Creek around 805 PM CDT. Goodfellow Air Force Base around 810 PM CDT. Wall around 815 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Us- 67 Near The Irion-Tom Green County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
